0.4.0 / 2015-04-21
==================

  * Reporters refactoring
  * Adding standard `json` reporter
  * Extending API with custom reporters hookup
  * Added .editorconfig

==================

  * Add information about changes

==================

  * Add php support

==================

  * Fix package.json
  * Changed changelog :)
  * fix tests, added changelog
  * wip, remove js tokenizer
  * wip, change tokenizer
